name: Security Services

name: Technology Services
headerTwo: Smart People. Smart Technology. Smarter Deployment
captionOne: When it comes to reducing risk, you need a solution customized to the unique needs of your organization—including your site-specific requirements. With experience and deep industry expertise across a wide array of industries, Langley Security is a proven partner to help you safeguard your people, assets, and reputation. By leveraging the right combination of trained security professionals, data and cutting-edge technology, we are able to deploy smarter, more effective security programs for our clients.
captionTwo: With customized security solutions ranging from situational awareness and threat intelligence platforms, to remote video and alarm monitoring, to integrated commercial security systems, we provide full lifecycle support of leading-edge technology to ensure the safety and security of your personnel and property.

name: Professional Services
description: Security Risk Assessment, Prevention and consultation
captionOne: Langley Security Risk Advisory and Consulting Services combine risk and threat assessment, prevention, and investigative practices developed over many years with the extensive experience and knowledge of industry-leading consultants into a centralized practice with strategic focus on reducing risk. We help customers determine where and when risk is most likely to turn into threat and the most effective means to combat threat—arming organizations with the knowledge to make critical business decisions that ensure better risk management outcomes.
captionTwo: Langley Security provides comprehensive, global, protection services for 24/7, 365 days a year coverage through our Executive Protection and Intelligence Services division.  Mitigating risks and threats along with extensive intelligence analysis are at the core of all our customized protection programs for close protection, secure travel logistics, and related security services for the well-being and productivity of a principal wherever and whenever necessary.

services.name: Risk advisory consultancy
services.description: Understand and distill risk to it's most relevant impact, and act to minimize that impact.

services.name: Private & corporate intelligence
services.description: Knowledge is power. We provide you with hard to get information on a personal and/or corporate level.
